0.1.name: wordpress/sr-childpages
0.1.description: This plugin allows page authors to easily list any child pages of a given page by simply using a new [childpages] shortcode. A basic list of the children to the page you're editing will be returned with the shortcode [childpages]. More-complex versions of the shortcode, as described in the Usage section, give you additional control over the output results.
